data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
BabelKit and CodeKit both embody interfaces to universal code
    tables that provide unlimited virtual database code tables with no
    schema changes or programming. Code tables store code sets and their
    associated descriptions and sort orders. In the case of BabelKit the
    code descriptions are multilingual.

    They both use DBI so they are respectively:

    DBIx::BabelKit

    DBIx::CodeKit

    This registration was submitted 6 weeks ago but never "took" so I
    am trying again.

    Thanks, John
